channel.title: Home on HumLUG - Humboldt Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in Home on HumLUG - Humboldt Linux Users Group

item.description: About HumLUG: The Humboldt Linux Users Group is a group of individuals in the Humboldt County area that enjoy the use of Linux and discussions about technology. We enjoy meeting and being able to spend time with interesting people who share our interests and the opportunity to learn new things.

Announcements: The return of Thursday evening presentation meetings! First meeting: 6:00PM March 16, 2023 at the Babe’s Pizza conference room Presentation by Sam covering configuration management through Ansible Official HumLUG community Matrix server! Coming sometime in 2023

HumLUG Events: Lunch meetings: HumLug meets for lunch and fun discussions about technology every friday at 11:30pm at Babe’s Pizza in Eureka. Evening meetings: We have monthly presentation focussed meetings on the third Thursday at 6:00PM at Babe’s Pizza in Eureka. First meeting: 6:00PM March 16, 2023 at the Babe’s Pizza conference room Presentation by Sam covering configuration management through Ansible
Join HumLUG’s mailing list! If you would like to join the HumLUG mailing list then please send an email to admin@humlug.org with your request.
